name: Meet Kris Kringle
description:
un-cover the secret hidden in this little town using the connections from the town members. 

6 possible endings. With only 1 being the good ending...

make sure you do the right things, even if it isn't the most obvious... 

Where is Santa?

How do You meet him?

Find out...

(WASD) to move

(SHIFT) to sprint

(C) to crouch

Walk over objects to pick them up

Walk up to people to talk to them
